Generated Narrative: ValueSet PregnancyCodes

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    CodeDisplay
    Z33.1Pregnant state, incidental
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    87527008Term pregnancy
    127364007Primigravida
    72892002Normal pregnancy

name: PregnancyCodes
title: Pregnancy Codes
description: Pregnancy Codes - used for EHRs to consider pregnancy status
